description:
In the interstellar world of the Osphia Empire, Zhuo Yang, a rare guide, became the husband of the disabled sentinel crown prince, Prince Moodys Bricania, after his younger half-brother escaped from their arranged marriage to elope with Zhuo Yang's marriage partner.

Moodys was once the most coveted companion for all guides in the empire, and he was voted nationally by the people of Osphia as the future monarch who could bring hope to the people. In the eyes of tens of thousands of fans and supporters, there is simply no guide in the world who can be worthy of their royal prince. 

Moodys Bricania was unexpectedly ambushed, he exhausted his mental power, his legs were crippled, and his face was attacked by Zerg venom leaving extremely disgusting scars after healing…

However, there was one thing no one expected, Zhuo Yang was sincerely looking forward to his wedding day. >
